dfs

Class NameNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • dfs.NameNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NameNodeInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class NameNode
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements NameNodeInterface
    This is the main thread class of name node. It setups a thread to provide name node service and a monitor thread to update status of all data nodes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
